page.title: 06 HOME LIFE
page.content: A day in the life of Peter Costello (age 11) Saturday 29_6-85 0730 Got up 1830 Eat tea 0800 Breakfast 1900 Sonu Takhar 0830 Rode bike came round to 0900 Used computer program my 1000 Watched T.V. computer with me 1030 Listen to radio 2040 Sonu went 1130 Call for Leon 2045 Had wash 1145 Play out 2055 Watch T.V. 1330 Dinner 2230 Go to bed 1400 Call for Kevin watch my T.V. in 1415 Play cricket bed 1530 Shopping 2330 Go to sleep 1600 Call for John 1615 Play with John 1730 Go in 1745 Have a rest
